subject: Golf
Olympic Games (2016)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: In advance of golf’s return to the Olympics next year in Rio de Janeiro, the antidoping program golfers are set to join is considerably less predictable and more invasive.
snippet: In advance of golf’s return to the Olympics next year in Rio de Janeiro, the antidoping program golfers are set to join is considerably less predictable and more invasive.
